item.description:
Laughter Meditation is a deep and playful practice which combines intentional laughter and silent sitting. It is sustaining and restorative. We invite you to join us on Mondays in January at 6:00 pm for a 45 minute by donation class taught by Katie West. You can drop in for just a single class or all four.
Come as you are. No experience necessary. We would love to have you.
Arcana Healing Arts Center -81 Market Street Portland
item.name: New Series:Laughter Meditation in January
